        Writes a provided file to a provided archive output stream at a path determined by the class of the component.
        Parameters:
        editConfigFile -
        componentClass -
        archiveStream -
        reservedNames - A list of files which already exist within the Zip Archive. If an edit config file already exists for a particular component, it is left untouched.
        componentPathBase -

        IOException
        ClassNotFoundException

        public static List<EditConfig> buildEditConfigFromClassList(List<javassist.CtClass> classList,
                                            org.apache.commons.compress.archivers.zip.ZipArchiveOutputStream zipOutputStream,
                                            Set<String> reservedNames,
                                            File buildDirectory,
                                            String componentPathBase,
                                            String defaultComponentPathSuffix,
                                            ComponentNameTransformer transformer)
                                                     throws InvalidComponentClassException,
                                                            TransformerException,
                                                            ParserConfigurationException,
                                                            IOException,
                                                            OutputFailureException,
                                                            ClassNotFoundException,
                                                            IllegalArgumentException,
                                                            SecurityException,
                                                            IllegalAccessException,
                                                            InvocationTargetException,
                                                            NoSuchMethodException
        For each class in the provided classList which is annotated with a Component annotation, an EditConfig object is built and added to the returned list. Classes which are not thusly annotated are ignored.
        Parameters:
        classList -
        zipOutputStream -
        reservedNames -
        Returns:
        The constructed list of EditConfig objects

        InvalidComponentClassException
